nodes.text: Ptak-Sok was a Arachnoid smuggler mechanic who was associated with three other smugglers: Bruce Mercy, Morph, and Durquist.
Ptak-Sok appeared in the adventure Treasure Hunt, published in Twin Stars of Kira, a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars Roleplaying Game. His name is pronounced as "Patahk-Sook".
